title.narrative: Accountable Governance for Improved Service Delivery (AGIS) activity

description.narrative: The overall objective of the Accountable Governance for Improved Service Delivery (AGIS) activity is to increase transparency and accountability in the Government of the Republic of Zambias (GRZs delivery of public health and education services. The activity will focus on targeted top public financial management priorities that will improve internal control, internal audit, and procurement in the Ministry of Health and Education.
